member.name: M:GCC.Common.CHelperDateTime.FormatDateTimeAsYYYYMMDD(System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Devuelve una cadena en formato YYYYMMDD, si es una fecha válida. Caso contrario devuelve nothing. Si es el valor inicial de tipo fecha (01/01/1990), tambien devuelve nothing.
member.returns: String con un dato fecha en formato YYYYMMDD, nothing si no es fecha
member.remarks: Creado Por : TSF - EBL Fecha de Creación : 07/05/2012

member.name: P:GCC.Common.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:GCC.Common.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:GCC.Common.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

members.member: Object to retreve Field from name of the field to retrieve

Returns a property or field value using a base object and sub members including . syntax. For example, you can access: this.oCustomer.oData.Company with (this,"oCustomer.oData.Company")
Parent object to 'start' parsing from. The property to retrieve. Example: 'oBus.oData.Company'

Sets the property on an object.
Object to set property on Name of the property to set value to set it to

Sets the field on an object.
Object to set property on Name of the field to set value to set it to

Sets the value of a field or property via Reflection. This method alws for using '.' syntax to specify objects multiple levels down.
wwUtils.SetPropertyEx(this,"Invoice.LineItemsCount",10)
which would be equivalent of:
this.Invoice.LineItemsCount = 10;
Object to set the property on.
Property to set. Can be an object hierarchy with . syntax.
Value to set the property to

Wrapper method to call a 'dynamic' (non-typelib) method on a COM object
1st - Method name, 2nd - 1st parameter, 3rd - 2nd parm etc.
